name: Simple Space Shooter (Kosmo the Space Cat)
name_original: Simple Space Shooter (Kosmo the Space Cat)
description:
Shooter similar to Asteroids. I made it a long time ago when I was learning JS.

You can play it by yourself, with your friend or AI partner.

There are four types of ships in the game:

- Standard - no special abilities

- Big - slow, but doesn't take damage from asteroid shards

- Fast - emits shots every few seconds

- Small - can't crash into UFOs.

Every two rounds you get a new, fully repaired ship.

Controls in menu:

Up-Down arrows to navigate

Enter to choose

1P controls:

Move - Arrow keys

Shoot - Ctrl

Pause - Enter

2P Blue controls:

Move - Arrow keys

Shoot - Num. 1

2P Red controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Shift
